text: Samantha Jane Barks (born 2 October 1990) is a Manx singer and actress who first rose to fame after coming third in the BBC talent show–themed television series I'd Do Anything in 2008. In 2012, she was cast in her first movie as Éponine in the movie version of the long-running musical Les Misérables. == Filmography == Year Title Role Notes 2012 Les Misérables Éponine ==Awards== * 2013 Elle Style Awards for Best Breakthrough Performance - Les Misérables * 2012 Hollywood Film Festival Hollywood Spotlight Award - Les Misérables * 2012 National Board of Review Award for Best Cast - Les Misérables * 2012 Satellite Award for Best Cast – Motion Picture - Les Misérables * 2012 Washington D.C. Area Film Critics Association Award for Best Ensemble - Les Misérables * 2012 Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture - Les Misérables - (nomination) * 2012 Satellite Award for Best Supporting Actress – Motion Picture - Les Misérables - (nomination) * 2012 San Diego Film Critics Society Award for Best Supporting Actress – Motion Picture - Les Misérables - (nomination) * 2012 an Diego Film Critics Society Award for Best Performance by an Ensemble - Les Misérables - (nomination) * 2012 Washington D.C. Area Film Critics Association Award for Best Supporting Actress – Motion Picture - Les Misérables - (nomination) * 2012 Broadcast Film Critics Association Award for Best Acting Ensemble - Les Misérables - (nomination) * 2012 London Film Critics Circle Award for Young British Performer of the Year - Les Misérables - (nomination) * 2012 Chicago Film Critics Association Award for Most Promising Performer - Les Misérables - (nomination) * 2012 Alliance of Women Film Journalists Award for Best Breakthrough Performance - Les Misérables - (nomination) ==References== ==Other websites== * * Samantha Barks' CV at United Agents * "Sam Singing Defying Defying Gravity"—YouTube Category:1990 births Category:British singers Category:Living people Category:Manx people Category:British movie actors Category:British artists Category:British television actors Category:Musical theater actors
title: Samantha Barks
